content.Introduction: Intoxicated Driver ("we," "our," "us") values your privacy. This notice explains what data we collect during gameplay and how we use it.
content.Data we collect:
- Gameplay Data: Levels played, game modes selected, level, .... 
- Device Information: Basic details like device type and operating system.
content.Why We Collect Data:
- Improve Gameplay: To enhance game features and user experience. 
- Analytics: To understand player behavior and improve the game.
content.Third-Party Services: We use google analytics to gather data, we will never share your data with any thid-parties
content.Contact Us: For questions, contact us on our discord
